summary: The diff adds a full storefront/admin React app with routing, cart/checkout UI, payment method selector (COD + manual UPI reference), and a single Motoko backend actor with catalog/order/payment types and admin-gated catalog mutations. From the visible diff summary, most BuildRequest items appear addressed, but some requirements cannot be conclusively verified due to backend truncation and omitted added files. A few extra, unrequested features/behaviors were introduced (user profile management and a secret-token-based access-control initialization path).

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management (get/save caller user profile, profile setup modal flow)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention storing or requiring admin/user profiles; admin protection is specified via Internet Identity login, not profile collection.

hallucinated_features.description: Secret-parameter-based access control initialization using a URL token ("caffeineAdminToken")
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires Internet Identity protected admin interface; it does not request a separate secret token mechanism passed via URL parameters to initialize access control.
